Class Level1

  • java.lang.Object
    • Scene
      • Level1

  • public class Level1
extends Scene
    Class Level1 is the first stage of the game, organising all location of different objects like enemies, coins and player. Inside Level1, player and enemies will be checked death and damage continuously, and direct to game over or win scene. Also, class named Level1 is for first level of game. Further development of levelx is feasible.
    Author:
    kevingok

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Level1()
      Class constructor defines start of the level and run initialization.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        Initiate all variables need in game play of Level 1.
        Specified by:
        init in class Scene

      • update

        public void update()
        Update status of all sources of moving game object. Such method is the most important one for handling all events happened during gamrplay. For example, if player is dead, update() will validate player's HP and direct scene to GameOverScene. Other handling event, namely coin detection, enemy damage detection, Boss behavior, etc.
        Specified by:
        update in class Scene

      • render

        public void render(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
        Draw out the level 1 game scene including background, map, player, enemies, coins and HP display gauge.
        Specified by:
        render in class Scene
        Parameters:
        gc - Image of the scene.
